{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|つう|やく|yomi=o}}
{{wikipedia|Language interpretation}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=つうやく}} {{m|zh|通譯}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|つうやく|y=o|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|つうやく|kyu=通譯}}

# [[interpreting]], [[interpretation]]: the [[facilitation]] of [[spoken]] [[conversation]] between two or more parties that do not all speak a [[common]] [[language]]
# an [[interpreter]]: someone who [[interpret]]s [[speech]] in the language of the speaker into the language of the listener

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|通事}}, {{l|ja|通詞}}, {{l|ja|通辞|tr=[[つうじ]], ''[[tsūji]]''}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{l|ja|通訳者|tr=[[つうやくしゃ]], ''[[tsūyakusha]]''}}: an [[interpreter]]
* {{l|ja|通訳生|tr=[[つうやくせい]], ''[[tsūyakusei]]''}}: a [[student]] interpreter
* {{l|ja|同時通訳|tr=[[どうじつうやく]], ''[[dōji tsūyaku]]''}}: [[simultaneous]] [[interpreting]]
* {{l|ja|逐次通訳|tr=[[ちくじつうやく]], ''[[chikuji tsūyaku]]''}}: [[consecutive]] [[interpreting]]
* {{l|ja|ウィスパリング通訳|tr=[[ウィスパリングつうやく]], ''[[wisuparingu tsūyaku]]''}}: [[whispered]] [[interpreting]]
* {{l|ja|会議通訳|tr=[[かいぎつうやく]], ''[[kaigi tsūyaku]]''}}: [[conference]] [[interpreting]]
* {{l|ja|エスコート通訳|tr=[[エスコートつうやく]], ''[[esukōto tsūyaku]]''}}: [[escort]] [[interpreting]]
* {{l|ja|放送通訳|tr=[[ほうそうつうやく]], ''[[hōsō tsūyaku]]''}}: [[broadcast]] [[interpreting]]
{{der-bottom}}

====See also====
* {{l|ja|翻訳|tr=[[ほんやく]], ''[[hon'yaku]]''}}: [[translation]] of [[written]] matter from one language to another

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|つうやく|kyu=通譯|tr=trans}}

# to [[interpret]]: to listen to [[speech]] in one language and then [[convey]] the meaning of that speech in the language of the listener

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|つうやく}}

====See also====
